tool_description: Calculates lime or sulfur requirements to adjust soil pH to optimal levels for specific crops, considering soil texture and buffer capacity.

target_ph.description: Desired soil pH for crop production (4.0-8.5)

buffer_ph.description: Buffer pH reading for lime requirement calculation

soil_texture.description: Primary soil texture class (sand, loam, clay, silt)

field_area.description: Area to be treated in acres

error_messages: Invalid pH values: Current and target pH must be between 3.0-10.0 and 4.0-8.5 respectively.
Invalid buffer pH: Buffer pH must be between 6.0-7.8 if provided.
Invalid soil texture: Use sand, loam, clay, or silt.
Invalid field area: Area must be greater than 0 acres.
pH adjustment not needed: Current pH is already within acceptable range of target pH.
usage: Provide current_ph, target_ph, soil_texture, and field_area. Include buffer_ph for more accurate lime calculations when raising pH.

amendment_type.description: Type of amendment needed (lime, sulfur, none)

application_rate.description: Amendment application rate in tons or lbs per acre

total_amount.description: Total amount needed for entire field
